summary: Adds Two dogs to the companions Hall.
descriptionHtml:
[center]============================== Midnight Rakuen Production =========================

This adds two dogs to The Companions Hall, Jorrvaskr; Ysgram and Hircine. They are a part of the faction and roam around the Halls when not in not in your service.Â
